# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-to-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-102">Legge til emojis eller GIF-filer i meldinger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-102">Add emojis or GIFs to messages</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-103">Svare på en eksisterende e-post, eller velg **Ny melding**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-104">Velg smilefjeset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-105">nederst i skrivevinduet for å åpne ruten uttrykk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-106">Søke etter og velge emoji eller GIF som du vil sette inn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c7c4f-107">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [Tilpasse e-postmeldingen i Outlook på weben](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c7c4f-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
